title: Presidential Determination Pursuant to Section 1245(d)(4)(B) and (C) of the National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2012
summary: Presidential Determination No. 202601, issued on November 5, 2025, states that there is a sufficient global supply of petroleum and petroleum products from countries other than Iran. This determination, made under the National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2012, allows for a significant reduction in the volume of petroleum and petroleum products purchased from Iran by foreign financial institutions. The President will continue to monitor the situation.
